00101 typedef enum
00102 {
00103    GAN_CHAR,       
00104    GAN_UCHAR,      
00105    GAN_SHORT,      
00106    GAN_USHORT,

00108    GAN_UINT,

00130 /* GAN_UINT8/16/32/64_MAX is the maximum value a 8/16/32/64 bit unsigned
00131  * type can hold. */
00132 
00133 /* set floating-point versions of integer type limits */
00134 #if (SIZEOF_CHAR == 1)
00135 #define GAN_CHAR_MAXD 127.0
00136 #define GAN_CHAR_MAXF 127.0F
00137 #define GAN_UCHAR_MAXD 255.0
00138 #define GAN_UCHAR_MAXF 255.0F
00139 #endif
00140 
00141 #if (SIZEOF_SHORT == 2)
00142 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXD 32767.0
00143 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXF 32767.0F
00144 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXD 65535.0
00145 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXF 65535.0F
00146 #elif (SIZEOF_SHORT == 4)
00147 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXD 2147483647.0
00148 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXF 2147483647.0F
00149 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXD 4294967295.0
00150 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXF 4294967295.0F
00151 #elif (SIZEOF_SHORT == 8)
00152 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXD 9.2233720368547758e18
00153 #define GAN_SHRT_MAXF 9.2233720368547758e18F
00154 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXD 1.8446744073709552e19
00155 #define GAN_USHRT_MAXF 1.8446744073709552e19F
00156 #endif
00157 
00158 #if (SIZEOF_INT == 2)
00159 #define GAN_INT_MAXD 32767.0
00160 #define GAN_INT_MAXF 32767.0F
00161 #define GAN_UINT_MAXD 65535.0
00162 #define GAN_UINT_MAXF 65535.0F
00163 #elif (SIZEOF_INT == 4)
00164 #define GAN_INT_MAXD 2147483647.0
00165 #define GAN_INT_MAXF 2147483647.0F
00166 #define GAN_UINT_MAXD 4294967295.0
00167 #define GAN_UINT_MAXF 4294967295.0F
00168 #elif (SIZEOF_INT == 8)
00169 #define GAN_INT_MAXD 9.2233720368547758e18
00170 #define GAN_INT_MAXF 9.2233720368547758e18F
00171 #define GAN_UINT_MAXD 1.8446744073709552e19
00172 #define GAN_UINT_MAXF 1.8446744073709552e19F
00173 #endif
00174 
00175 #if (SIZEOF_LONG == 4)
00176 #define GAN_ULONG_MAXD 4294967295.0
00177 #define GAN_ULONG_MAXF 4294967295.0F
00178 #elif (SIZEOF_LONG == 8)
00179 #define GAN_LONG_MAXD 9.2233720368547758e18
00180 #define GAN_LONG_MAXF 9.2233720368547758e18F
00181 #define GAN_ULONG_MAXD 1.8446744073709552e19
00182 #define GAN_ULONG_MAXF 1.8446744073709552e19F
00183 #endif
00184 
00185 /* 8-bit integer types */
00186 #if (SIZEOF_CHAR == 1)
00187 typedef          char gan_int8;
00188 typedef unsigned char gan_uint8;
00189 #define GAN_INT8  GAN_CHAR
00190 #define GAN_UINT8 GAN_UCHAR
00191 #define GAN_INT8_MIN  CHAR_MIN
00192 #define GAN_INT8_MAX  CHAR_MAX
00193 #define GAN_UINT8_MAX UCHAR_MAX
00194 #define GAN_UINT8_MAXD GAN_UCHAR_MAXD
00195 #define GAN_UINT8_MAXF GAN_UCHAR_MAXF
00196 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_CHAR == 1) */
00197 
00198 /* 16-bit integer types */
00199 #if (SIZEOF_SHORT == 2)
00200 typedef          short gan_int16;
00201 typedef unsigned short gan_uint16;
00202 #define GAN_INT16  GAN_SHORT
00203 #define GAN_UINT16 GAN_USHORT
00204 #define GAN_INT16_MIN  SHRT_MIN
00205 #define GAN_INT16_MAX  SHRT_MAX
00206 #define GAN_UINT16_MAX USHRT_MAX
00207 #define GAN_UINT16_MAXD GAN_USHRT_MAXD
00208 #define GAN_UINT16_MAXF GAN_USHRT_MAXF
00209 #elif (SIZEOF_INT == 2)
00210 typedef          int gan_int16;
00211 typedef unsigned int gan_uint16;
00212 #define GAN_INT16  GAN_INT
00213 #define GAN_UINT16 GAN_UINT
00214 #define GAN_INT16_MIN  INT_MIN
00215 #define GAN_INT16_MAX  INT_MAX
00216 #define GAN_UINT16_MAX UINT_MAX
00217 #define GAN_UINT16_MAXD GAN_UINT_MAXD
00218 #define GAN_UINT16_MAXF GAN_UINT_MAXF
00219 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_SHORT == 2) */
00220 
00221 /* 32-bit integer types */
00222 #if (SIZEOF_INT == 4)
00223 typedef          int gan_int32;
00224 typedef unsigned int gan_uint32;
00225 #define GAN_INT32  GAN_INT
00226 #define GAN_UINT32 GAN_UINT
00227 #define GAN_INT32_MIN  INT_MIN
00228 #define GAN_INT32_MAX  INT_MAX
00229 #define GAN_UINT32_MAX UINT_MAX
00230 #define GAN_UINT32_MAXD GAN_UINT_MAXD
00231 #define GAN_UINT32_MAXF GAN_UINT_MAXF
00232 #elif (SIZEOF_LONG == 4)
00233 typedef          long gan_int32;
00234 typedef unsigned long gan_uint32;
00235 #define GAN_INT32  GAN_LONG
00236 #define GAN_UINT32 GAN_ULONG
00237 #define GAN_INT32_MIN  LONG_MIN
00238 #define GAN_INT32_MAX  LONG_MAX
00239 #define GAN_UINT32_MAX ULONG_MAX
00240 #define GAN_UINT32_MAXD GAN_ULONG_MAXD
00241 #define GAN_UINT32_MAXF GAN_ULONG_MAXF
00242 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_INT == 4) */
00243 
00244 /* 64-bit unsigned type */
00245 #if (SIZEOF_INT == 8)
00246 typedef          int gan_int64;
00247 typedef unsigned int gan_uint64;
00248 #define GAN_INT64  GAN_INT
00249 #define GAN_UINT64 GAN_UINT
00250 #define GAN_INT64_MIN  INT_MIN
00251 #define GAN_INT64_MAX  INT_MAX
00252 #define GAN_UINT64_MAX UINT_MAX
00253 #define GAN_UINT64_MAXD GAN_UINT_MAXD
00254 #define GAN_UINT64_MAXF GAN_UINT_MAXF
00255 #elif (SIZEOF_LONG == 8)
00256 typedef          long gan_int64;
00257 typedef unsigned long gan_uint64;
00258 #define GAN_INT64  GAN_LONG
00259 #define GAN_UINT64 GAN_ULONG
00260 #define GAN_INT64_MIN  LONG_MIN
00261 #define GAN_INT64_MAX  LONG_MAX
00262 #define GAN_UINT64_MAX ULONG_MAX
00263 #define GAN_UINT64_MAXD GAN_ULONG_MAXD
00264 #define GAN_UINT64_MAXF GAN_ULONG_MAXF
00265 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_INT == 8) */
00266 
00267 /* 32-bit float type */
00268 #if (SIZEOF_FLOAT == 4)
00269 typedef float gan_float32;
00270 #define GAN_FLOAT32 GAN_FLOAT
00271 #define GAN_FLOAT32_MIN  FLT_MIN
00272 #define GAN_FLOAT32_MAX  FLT_MAX
00273 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_FLOAT == 4) */
00274 
00275 /* 64-bit float type */
00276 #if (SIZEOF_DOUBLE == 8)
00277 typedef double gan_float64;
00278 #define GAN_FLOAT64 GAN_DOUBLE
00279 #define GAN_FLOAT64_MIN  DBL_MIN
00280 #define GAN_FLOAT64_MAX  DBL_MAX
00281 #endif /* #if (SIZEOF_DOUBLE == 8) */
00282 
00283 /* check sizes of objects we just defined */
00284 #if (GAN_UINT8_MAX != 0xff)
00285 #error Inconsistent 8-bit integer size
00286 #endif
00287 
00288 #if (GAN_UINT16_MAX != 0xffff)
00289 #error Inconsistent 16-bit integer size
00290 #endif
00291 
00292 #if (GAN_UINT32_MAX != 0xffffffff)
00293 #error Inconsistent 32-bit integer size
00294 #endif
00295 
00296 #if (GAN_UINT64_MAX != 0xffffffffffffffff)
00297 #error Inconsistent 64-bit integer size
00298 #endif

00354 /* extra useful constants */

00356 #define GAN_ONE_THIRD_F 0.3333333333333333333333F

00360 /* powf and sqrtf are not available on all platforms: */
00361 #ifndef HAVE_POWF
00362 #define powf(x,y) (float)pow((float)(x), (float)(y))
00363 #endif
00364 
00365 #ifndef HAVE_FABSF
00366 #define fabsf(x) (float)fabs((float)(x))
00367 #endif
00368 
00369 #ifndef HAVE_SQRTF
00370 #define sqrtf(x) (float)sqrt((float)(x))
00371 #endif
